channel.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
channel.description:
So I was just curious as to what you guys are expecting/hoping for from deathmatch?
More on the levels side. Of course there will be some of the original maps, but I personally am hoping they get creative with the DM level design to make it more than just a classic run-and-gun mode.
Specifically, traps. I'm really hoping for maps that have triggerable traps like classic Quake and UT maps, whether it being putting a plug in a pool to electrify water like the OaR puzzle, or physics based traps like destroying supports to crush players, or something even like being able to trigger the surgery bot from Questionable Ethics on other players. I feel like they could really make creative use of the setting to make for some really fun multiplayer maps.
So what kind of cool shit are you guys hoping to see in DM?

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: Open_Source_Forever
item.description:
I’m hoping they actually take the chance to have some Xen death-match (stupid spell-check) maps. I understand Half-Life 1’s development team’s decision not to do so (frankly, their interpretation of Xen has no death-match capability), but the Black Mesa: Source development team IS trying to steer as clear as possible of Xen Syndrome.

Read full topic

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
Artic Xiongmao:

More modern, elaborate modes. Nothing too fancy, but something asymmetrical, as Bloodshot said, which would make it more interesting. Maybe a horde mode as soldiers against a variety of NPC aliens, too. I know there’s an over-saturation of horde mode, but It’d be cool to see it in the context of Black Mesa.

I agree, although I doubt there will be an official mode for this… but I’d imagine it could be done…

Read full topic

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
sersoft:

if there is no zombie mode im gonna be a sad panda

If “zombie” you mean an analog to Halo’s infection or Crysis’s Hunter mode then fuck yes, I want that.

Read full topic

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: Kenley
item.description:
Bloodshot:

I would love to see people make custom gamemodes for this as well after DM comes out, like HECU vs Security guards, or vs xen aliens and such.

Having asymmetrical gameplay like that would be really awesome.

And there was that one person who made an experimental “tower defense” map for BM. I bet it could be adjusted for cooperative gameplay.

Read full topic

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
That it doesn’t require Windows specific code and as such could run on OSX as well (just MP, SP can stay on Windows if that’s too much work).

Surely this isn’t too much to ask?

Read full topic

TextFAMGUY1:

You do have the advantage of CREATING the maps, though. LOL!

Playing on the home turf has it’s advantages.

item.title: What you expect from Deathmatch?
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
HL: DM, one of the best online experiences back in the day. I expect it to return in all its glory, just like during old times, but I doubt that’s going to happen. It will have its playerbase, but any larger number of players that would compare to “insert you know which shooter” let’s say is just wishful thinking on my part I guess.

Read full topic
